OSGUser.name: OSG User
OSGUser.description: The OSG User template shows the usage of resources for a particular user(s) or projects(s).

VOManager.name: VO Manager
VOManager.description: The VO Manager template shows the usage of resources for a particular VO.

ResourceOwner.name: Resource Owner
ResourceOwner.description: The Resource Owner template shows the resource usage of many users on a set of resources.
